hero.headline: S-Group - Student Organization
hero.description: We are a student-led organization dedicated to developing skills and fostering growth in technology, marketing, and design.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: S-Group was founded with a vision to bridge the gap between academic learning and practical skills. We believe in learning by doing and creating opportunities for students to grow professionally while still in university.

training.title: Training
training.description: We provide comprehensive training programs in various fields, helping students develop practical skills that are in demand in the job market.

events.title: Events
events.description: We organize workshops, seminars, and networking events to connect students with industry professionals and create learning opportunities.

training.title: What We Train
training.description: Our training programs cover a wide range of fields, focusing on practical skills and real-world applications.

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Learn cutting-edge technologies and development practices.

marketing.title: Marketing Online
marketing.description: Master digital marketing strategies and techniques.

design.title: Design
design.description: Develop creative design skills for digital and print media.

testimonials.title: What Our Members Say
testimonials.description: Hear from our members about their experiences with S-Group.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.content: Joining S-Group was one of the best decisions I made during my university years. The practical training and networking opportunities have been invaluable for my career.

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.content: S-Group provided me with hands-on experience in digital marketing that I couldn't get from my regular classes. The mentors are knowledgeable and supportive.

testimonials.name: David Johnson
testimonials.content: The design workshops at S-Group helped me build a strong portfolio that impressed my employers. I'm grateful for the skills and confidence I gained.

about.title: About S-Group
about.description: S-Group is a student-led organization dedicated to developing practical skills and fostering professional growth among university students. We believe in learning by doing and creating opportunities for students to gain real-world experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower students with practical skills and knowledge that complement their academic education and prepare them for successful careers in technology, marketing, and design.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading student organization that bridges the gap between academic learning and industry requirements, creating a community of skilled and confident professionals.

social.title: Connect With Us
social.follow: Follow us on social media for updates and events
